summary: WHENEVER I MAKE A CERTAIN TURN MY WHEEL LOCKS UP AND I CAN NO LONGER TURN WITHOUT WRESTLING MY WHEEL TO TURN. MY DASHBOARD STARTS TO GO OFF AND I GET A MESSAGE 'POWER ASSIST AT FAULT'. I WOULD HAVE TO TURN MY CAR OFF AND ON A COUPLE TIMES FOR ME TO BE ABLE TO DRIVE AGAIN WITHOUT ANY ISSUES. IT GETS WORSE WHEN I'M ABOUT TO PULL OUT FROM A PARKING SPOT, THAT'S WHEN IT MAINLY STARTS.
